gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc
Interface JdbcConnectionProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceWrapper
All Known Implementing Classes:
HibernateSessionProviderImpl, JdbcConnectionProviderImpl
public interface JdbcConnectionProvider
extends ResourceWrapper

Database connection provider. This provider provides a database connection and the schema (table qualifier) of the database.

Method Summary
 Connection getConnection()
          Gets a connection to the database.
 String getDbSchema()
          Gets the database schema (tables qualifier) string.
 
Methods inherited from interface gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ResourceWrapper
close
 

Method Detail

getConnection

Connection getConnection()
Gets a connection to the database.

Returns:
Returns a database connection ready to be used.

getDbSchema

String getDbSchema()
Gets the database schema (tables qualifier) string. This string will replace the schema key used in SQL statements. If this method returns null, then there will be no replacement of the schema key and the SQL statement will be executed without any modification.

Returns:
Returns the schema of the database tables.
